name: Handgun (DennisByDEN.)
description:
The quickest fingers in the whole wild west! 

You find yourself surrounded by enemy agents and monsters, left for dead with nothing to fight with but your bare arms. 

Deploy your deadly finger gun to mow down countless waves of enemies in this simple arcade shooter. 

Aim for the highest score you can get. 

Controls: 
  • Mouse: aim 
  • Left click: shoot 
  • R: restart
  • Esc: quit

If you love this game look up my other games on itch.io.

Comment your experience and feel free to contact me via email (dennisbydengames@gmail.com)!

Follow my work and see you in my next projects and games!!!
